key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities including material shortages and shipping delays
Economic sensitivity tied to cyclical industries like housing and automotive
Environmental and regulatory scrutiny leading to potential compliance costs
Labor and legal issues including NLRB cases and wrongful death lawsuits
Dividend cuts and stock underperformance indicating financial strain
controversies: National Labor Relations Board case regarding labor practices
Wrongful death lawsuit related to a product defect
$407,000 payment in back wages due to discriminatory hiring practices
environmental_issues: Pressure to improve sustainability practices and reduce environmental impact
social_issues: Labor disputes and discriminatory hiring practices
governance_issues: Ethical concerns due to legal challenges and labor disputes
